resources.string: There was a problem retrieving your Sleep Timeline. Please try again in a few moments.
Are you sure you want to sign out?
Sense tracks your sleep, monitors the environment of your bedroom, and helps you wake up feeling great: https://hello.is
Make sure Sense is plugged into a wall outlet next to your bed.
Now we’ll pair your phone with Sense. Make sure Sense is plugged in, nearby, and glowing purple. Tap Continue when ready.

Before you connect your phone, Sense needs to be put into Pairing Mode.

Place your hand directly on top of Sense for seven seconds, and then remove it.

Sense will glow purple when it is in Pairing Mode.
Please select your Wi-Fi network from the list below:
Clip Sleep Pill to your Pillow
Clip Sleep Pill to your pillowcase by pulling the edge of the pillowcase taut. For best results, place your Sleep Pill on the side of your pillowcase closest to the edge of the bed.
Shake your Sleep Pill for three seconds to pair it with your Sense. You may need to shake it quickly for it to register.
Sense glows to tell you about the conditions in your bedroom – including temperature, humidity, light, and noise. Sense has three different colors.
Sense glows green when the conditions in your room are just right for a good night‘s sleep.
Sense glows yellow when something in your bedroom is not quite right. Check the Sense app for details.
Sense glows red when the conditions in your bedroom would prevent restful sleep. Check the Sense app for details.
Just wave your hand over Sense and instantly you‘ll know about the conditions in your bedroom. Go ahead, give it a try now.
Now, all you need to\ndo is sleep
Your Sleep Pill could not be Paired due to connectivity issues. Please try again.
Your Sleep Pill is already paired to an account.
\n\nPlease turn airplane mode on for a few seconds, turn it off, and then try again. If this problem persists, please visit our support site.

This will disconnect your account from this Sense, as well as any Sleep Pills you have paired. You will need to pair with another Sense to continue using the application. You should only perform a factory reset if instructed to do so by Support. This operation cannot be undone.

Are you sure you want to put Sense into Pairing Mode? You should use this option only if you have another mobile device you wish to pair with Sense. If you‘re having trouble, visit https://support.hello.is/ for support.
Don\'t worry, you can come back later.
Are you sure you want to delete this alarm?
We could not connect to your Sense. Please make sure your Sense is plugged in, nearby, and in Pairing Mode.

We could not connect to your Sense. A high-power scan can sometimes resolve Sense discovery issues, but will take a bit longer, and may temporarily disrupt other Bluetooth services. Would you like to try a high-power scan?
An account with the email address %1$s already exists.
The name you entered is too long.
The name you entered is too short.
Please enter a valid email address.
Passwords must be at least 6 characters.
The email address or password you entered is incorrect.
Please enter your email address and password.
Sense couldn\'t register your Sleep Pill. Please try pairing again. Try moving your Sleep Pill closer to Sense, and shaking it harder.
Could not detect a Sense nearby. Make sure Sense is plugged in, nearby, and in pairing mode. Ensure no other devices are connected with Sense over Bluetooth.
The connection to your Sense was lost.
This is used to provide you with more personalized sleep insights.
The passwords you entered do not match.
Are you sure you want to discard this alarm?
Are you sure you want to discard your changes to this alarm?
Sense uses Bluetooth to communicate with your mobile device. Please turn on your Bluetooth to continue.
Are you sure you want to pair with ‘%1$s’?
Sense\'s Smart Alarm knows where you are in your sleep cycle and will wake you up at the right time for you. To dismiss the alarm, just wave your hand over Sense.
Everything looks great.\nNow let’s set your first Smart Alarm.
Sense will now check the conditions in your bedroom.
You cannot set more than one Smart Alarm per day of the week.
Your device‘s time is significantly different from our reference time. From your device‘s Settings app, please enable automatic date & time, or enter the correct time manually.
You don‘t currently have a Sense connected to your account. Please pair with Sense to set alarms.
Are you sure you want to remove this Sleep Pill from your account? You will not be able to track your sleep until you pair another Sleep Pill.

Are you sure you want to remove this Sense from your account? Only do this if you are replacing it with a different Sense unit. You will need to pair with another Sense to continue using the application.
Please select a tone for this alarm.
Sense no longer requires Bluetooth be turned on, would you like to turn it off?
You don\'t currently have a Sense connected to your account.
You don\'t currently have a Sleep Pill connected to your account.
Bluetooth must be turned on to connect to Sense.
Your Sense cannot connect to Wi-Fi. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Your Sense was last seen %1$s. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Your Sleep Pill was last seen %1$s. Tap below to troubleshoot.
Setting up a second Sleep Pill for your partner?
With Enhanced Audio enabled, Sense can pick up snoring, sleep talking, and noise disturbances.\n\nWithout Enhanced Audio enabled, Sense only looks at background noise.
A new version of Sense is available.
Sense‘s Smart Alarm will wake you up at the lightest point in your natural sleep cycle, so you wake feeling rested. Once set, your alarms will appear here.
The current password you entered is incorrect.
Enhanced audio allows Sense to pick up snoring, sleep talking, and other noise disturbances.
Your account does not have a Sense paired. Sense is required to track your sleep behavior.
Your account does not have a Sleep Pill paired. A Sleep Pill is required to track your sleep behavior.
Sense has not reported any data recently. Tap ‘Fix Now’ to troubleshoot.
Sleep Pill has not reported any data recently. Tap ‘Fix Now’ to troubleshoot.
Your Sleep Pill battery is low, and will need to be replaced soon.

Sense monitors the environment in your bedroom and recognizes your movements during the night, giving you a full picture of your sleep.\n\nSense takes all this data and builds a Sleep Timeline of your sleep for each night. Swipe left to learn more.
Each morning, you‘ll receive a personalized Sleep Score — out of 100. All the data Sense collects about your sleep is synthesized into this one simple score.

Tap on the Sleep Summary at the top of your Timeline to view detailed stats about your night.\n\nYou‘ll see how long it took you to fall asleep, how long you spent in deep sleep, what the conditions were like in your bedroom, and more.

Your Timeline shows you everything that happened during the night, from the moment you go to bed until the time you wake up.

The blue bars represent your time spent sleeping. The wider the bar, the deeper the sleep. Tap on any bar to view more details.

Your Timeline will also show key events from your night, including time spent tossing and turning, noise disturbances, and more.

Here you‘ll see the current conditions in your bedroom: temperature, humidity, air quality, light, and noise.
 
These values update as Sense uploads new data. So as the conditions in your room change, it may take a few moments for them to be reflected here.

Tap a card to see more details.

Sense\'s Smart Alarm will wake you up at the lightest part of your natural sleep cycle - in a 30 minute window before the time you set. When it\'s time to wake up, Sense will glow and play your selected tone. Just wave your hand over Sense to dismiss the alarm.

A proper temperature in your bedroom is key to a good night’s sleep. Here you’ll see detailed information on the temperature levels in your bedroom. The graphs will fill in as Sense collects more data.
Humidity is a measure of the amount of moisture in the air. Here you’ll see detailed information on the humidity levels in your bedroom. The graphs will fill in as Sense collects more data.

Sense measures air quality in µg/m³, which is a measure of the amount of particulates in the air by volume. Here you‘ll see detailed information on the air quality in your bedroom. The graphs will fill in as Sense collects more data.

Sense measures light in lux (lx), which is the standard unit of illuminance. Here you’ll see detailed information on the light levels in your bedroom. The graphs will fill in as Sense collects more data.
Sense measures noise in decibels (dB). Here you’ll see detailed information on the noise levels in your bedroom. The graphs will fill in as Sense collects more data.

Sense\'s Smart Alarm will wake you up at the lightest part of your natural sleep cycle, up to 30 minutes before your requested wake-up time, making sure you wake up refreshed and at the right time for you.

Each Sleep Pill paired with Sense is assigned a unique color — you can see which color yours is on this page. If you shake your Sleep Pill for a few seconds, Sense will glow the color assigned to your Sleep Pill. If you’re sharing Sense with a partner, this is also a great way to tell your Sleep Pills apart if they get mixed up.
Sense is not designed to work without a Sleep Pill. You will not be able to track your sleep, or set Smart Alarms. If you\'re having trouble, you can skip for now, and pair a Sleep Pill later.

The device you‘re using has been known to have issues setting up Sense for the first time. If you have a different device available that meets the requirements on our Supported Devices list, we recommend you use it to perform the following setup steps.
Not enough data yet, check back later.
Your trends will appear here after a week of sleep.
We\’re collecting the data needed to show your Trends. Check back soon for more.
Sense will collect your trends overtime and will live here when there\'s more data.

plurals.name: message_trends_coming_soon
plurals.item: You\'re almost done tracking your first week, in %1$s day you will see new trends.
You\'re almost done tracking your first week, in %1$s days you will see new trends.

resources.string: Sleep Pill clips to your pillow and tracks your sleep during the night. Each person using Sense has their own Sleep Pill, so if you\'re using Sense with a partner, they will set up their Pill separately. Next, we\'ll pair your Sleep Pill with Sense.
Check your connection and try again.
There was a problem securely connecting to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.
Could not find a web browser.
Could not find an email app.
Too Soon! The alarm you set is only a couple minutes away. If you want to test the Alarm, please set an alarm for a bit later.
You‘ll need Sense and Sleep Pill handy to continue. If you‘re not ready now, you can always come back later.
Swipe left or right to navigate between days.
Tap the date to navigate quickly between days.
Press and hold graphs to see historical data.
Tap on a card to learn more.
To explore more now, tap the menu icon.
If you have a new Sense you want to pair with this account.
If you want to reset Sense to factory settings, and remove it from this account.
If you have a new Sleep Pill you want to pair with this account.
If you want to reset Sense to factory settings.
Your account could not be linked with Sense. You can try changing the WiFi Sense is configured to.
Sense has been successfully restored to factory settings. Please unplug Sense, wait a few seconds, and plug it back in before you continue.
Your device‘s volume may be too low for you to be able to hear the alarm tone preview. Would you like us to turn it up?
Making corrections to your timeline helps improve the algorithms that Sense uses to detect and analyze your sleep.
You don‘t currently have a Sense connected to your account. Please pair with Sense to view current conditions.
The event you selected does not have any actions available.
Describe the issue you are having
"Sense‘s time zone should be set based on the physical location of your Sense. Usually, that‘s the same as your phone‘s time zone. Your phone‘s current time zone is: "
In the morning, you‘ll see your first Sleep Timeline here. There are no modes to set - Sense will automatically know when you go to bed. All you need to do is sleep.
Your device does not have all of the APIs required by Sense. Android 4.3 and a device with Bluetooth Low Energy are required.
Great. Would you mind leaving us a rating on the Play Store?
Would you like to let us know how we can improve your experience?
Wake up feeling great, improve your sleep, and\nlearn how the environment of your bedroom\naffects your rest.
Unlike a normal alarm, Sense‘s Smart Alarm analyzes your sleep cycle to know when you‘re sleeping lightly, and wakes you up at the optimal time to start your day off right.
Your Sleep Timeline shows you a detailed analysis of your sleep cycles and helps you see how even minor interruptions to your sleep, like tossing and turning, can impact the quality of your rest.

Get instant feedback on your sleep and see how the quality of your sleep fluctuates over time. Make adjustments to your bedroom environment and sleep habits, get better sleep, and raise your Sleep Score.

Sense is packed with sensors that monitor the conditions of your bedroom, giving you unparalleled insight into how temperature, humidity, light, sound, and even air quality affects how well you sleep.
We need to ask for your location
"Android requires that Location Services are enabled to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices. Please enable Location Services to continue."
Android requires that Location Services be enabled to scan for Bluetooth Low Energy devices. Please enable Location Services in Settings to continue.
It took you <font color=#596980>%1$s</font> to fall asleep. You slept a total <font color=#596980>%2$s</font> and woke up <font color=#596980>%3$s</font> during the night.
